articles.title: AFI parts ways with national javelin coach Uwe Hohn, to hire two new coaches - India Today
articles.description: The Athletics Federation of India (AFI) on Monday announced the end of its association with national javelin coach Uwe Hohn, saying it is "not happy" with his performance and will hire two new foreign coaches soon.

articles.description: Jet Airways is set to resume domestic flight operations in the first quarter of 2022. It plans to start international operations later that year.
